name: Cinco de Mayo Guacamole
author: imma0308
summary: I combined two of my friends' guacamole recipes for Cinco de Mayo and woah! What a tasty guacamole it made! My friends and family raved! It's now on my list of potluck recipes. It's absolutely delicious as a fajita topping too! Enjoy! This recipe makes a medium-sized bowl of guac, so use more or less avocados for your party.
ingredients: 5  chopped leaves cilantro, or to taste
½ cup reduced-fat sour cream, or as needed
directions: Scoop 5 avocados into a large bowl
Add red onion, lime juice, cilantro, garlic, salt, pepper, and 2 dollops of sour cream
Mash with a fork until desired texture is reached
Cut remaining avocado into chunks and stir into guacamole with tomato
Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour before serving
